overview: Ukraine was for many years a forgotten land in Europe. However, in 2004, Ukraine's Ruslana won Eurovision and put Europe's largest country in focus. It has an abundance of wildlife and manifold landscapes, from the forests of the Carpathian Mountains, across the plains to the subtropical peninsula Krim on the coast of the Black Sea. Ruslana, Ukraine's biggest star, takes us on the ultimate sightseeing
title: Ukraine Wild
